articles.content:
He has pretty much mastered the art of providing the last line of defence behind a regular football team.

articles.content: Manchester United favourite Dimitar Berbatov admits the chant supporters created for him during his memorable spell at Old Trafford made him feel 'uncomfortable'. Berbatov played 148 games for United… [+1318 chars]
